item.title: A Decade of Climate Change in the Guardian
item.description: Explore a decade of climate change, global warming, natural disaster, extreme weather, pollution and deforestation in the articles published by the Guardian.

item.title: Evolution of Internet Users from 1990 - 2011
item.description: An animated evolution of Internet users across the worlds countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: Real-Time World Map of Earthquakes
item.description: A geographic map of the world showing real-time data for recent earthquakes rendered with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: World Aid Flow, Transparency, Development
item.description: An interactive visualization looking at world aid flow, aid transparency, and development in receiving countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: Exploit Database Platforms Spiral
item.description: A pack layout visualization of platforms sized by the number of exploits created with the JavaScript library D3 and data from the Exploit Database.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network D3
item.description: An network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences created with the JavaScript library D3.
